name: Ghost House Pong
summary:
It's Boo-against-Boo in this arcade-style minigame!

- Play Singles or Doubles matches with up to four players.

- Compete across five different courts, each with its own hazards that can be turned on or off.

- Listen to a playlist of classic tracks from the Mario series, as well as other spooky video game tracks.

- USB Controllers are required for doubles matches with 3-4 players.
